channel.title: Changing Range and Mage Bonus
channel.description: Basically in item.cfg i changed the bonus of chaotic staffs magic however it seems to hit no different i also tried it with changing the rangebonus on runecrossbow. and it also didnt see a difference.

item.title: Changing Range and Mage Bonus
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

I hope you realise that unlike melee, the max hits of magic and ranged are not affected by bonus (one reason why ‘perfect’ ring doesn’t 1 hit KO using these attack styles) - all your doing by increasing bonus is increasing accuracy (less 0’s or ‘splashes’).

To increase ranged max hit you need:
-a higher ranged level
-a ranging potion
-more powerful ammo
-special effect armour (eg void range)

To increase magic max hit you need:
-a more powerful spell
-overload/extreme potion?
-special effect armour

Read full topic
